Package <Unnamed>

Class Summary
BackgroundPanel The BackgroundPanel class controls the animation of the road lanes.
ButtonPanel The ButtonPanel class holds the buttons for creating a New Game, Showing/Hiding lane lines, Pausing the game, and Quitting the game.
Car The Car class contains the definition and methods that are used to create and manipulate cars.
Driver The Driver class contains the code to start the program.
GamePanel The GamePanel class controls the displaying of the cars and updating events to do with them.
LabelPanel The LabelPanel class is used to display 3 labels.
ScrollerPanel The ScrollerPanel class holds the slider to set the difficulty and a label stating what difficulty has currently been set.
